fulltext:
RESUME 
Full name: VŨ MẠNH HÙNG (male).                         Birthday: 18/03/1982 
Mobile: 0907.582.526                                                    Email: vuhung246@gmail.com  
EDUCATION/QUALIFICATIONS 
Bachelor of Information Technology (2000-2005). 
AWARDS/ACHIEVEMENTS 
v 
One of  the top four students during studying at the University of Van Lang 
(2000 - 2005). 
v 
Top the list of successful candidates in University entry examination of Van 
Lang university in year 2000.  
v 
Very good student award of the University of Van Lang for the year 2001. 
TIMELINE 
- 
2005: Graduate Van Lang university. 
- 
2005 - 2006: Worked at K&G(http://www.kng.vn) company as developer in Ho Chi 
Minh city. 
- 
2006 - 2011: Went to Japan and worked at VTM(http://vtm.co.jp) company as 
mobile(Brew, iPhone, Android) developer in Kawasaki. 
- 
2011 - 2017: Comeback Viet Nam and started up with Kawasoft company. 
- 
2017 - 2018: Work at KMS Technology as senior software engineer.

WORK EXPERIENCE 
Kobiton   ( https://kobiton.com ) 
- Type: Mobile Cloud System. 
- Description: Kobiton is a mobile testing platform that accelerates delivery and 
testing of mobile apps by offering manual and automated testing on real devices, 
in the cloud or on-premise. 
- Technology: Javascript, Koa, Sequelize, PostgreSQL, iOS, Android, WebDriver, 
Appium, Socket, DevTunnel...  
- Time: 7/2017 – 05/2018 
- Number of member: 20 
OneMusic   ( http://bit.ly/2wq2NLA ) 
- Type: iOS Application. 
- Description: OneMusic is a music player and equalizer for iOS. 
- Technology: iOS, Obj-C, SQLite, CoreData, StoreKit, CoreMedia, etc. 
- Time: 8 months (10/2016 – 05/2017) 
- Number of member: 4 
AirTrunk   ( https://itunes.apple.com/jp/app/id1139644380 ) 
- Type: iPhone Application. 
- Description: Managed mobile application to manage warehouse in Japan market. 
- Technology: iOS & Android, Swift, UIKit, RestFul API, PHP, MySQL, etc. 
- Time: 5 months (03/2016 – 8/2016) 
- Number of member: 4 
SiteViewer   ( http://www.renacentia.com/ja/product/siteviewer.html ) 
- Type: iPhone Application. 
- Description: SiteViewer is a special RSS reader/browser which optimizes 
webpage for maximum readability on the iPhone/iPod Touch. 
- Technology: iOS, SQLite, CoreData, PHP, MySQL, etc. 
- Time: 8 months (02/2010 – 10/2010) 
- Number of member: 3
